title: Moving charges - electron path in magnetic field

content.question: An electron with charge <math alttext="negative e" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>-</mo><mi>e</mi></math> and mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> moves to the right with speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> as it enters a region containing a magnetic field of magnitude <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>B</mi></math> directed into the page. The electron moves in a circular path of radius <math alttext="r" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi></math> and exits the field moving to the left as shown. Which of the following is equal to the time the electron spends moving through the magnetic field?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator pi m, and denominator e B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 pi m, and denominator e B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="pi times the square root of the fraction with numerator m r, and denominator e B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>π</mi><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>r</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 pi times the square root of the fraction with numerator m r, and denominator e B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>r</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator pi m, and denominator e B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
